column1: ,"directory","file_name","variable_name","variable_type","description"
1,"data","saniabidjan.rda","area_name","factor","Identify survey areas."
2,"data","saniabidjan.rda","sex","factor","Indicates respondents gender."
3,"data","saniabidjan.rda","education","factor","Indicates level of education of respondents."
4,"data","saniabidjan.rda","housing_type","factor","Description of the accommodation unit where the respondent lives."
5,"data","saniabidjan.rda","status","factor","Indicates if respondent is the homeowner or not."
6,"data","saniabidjan.rda","lat_facilities","logical","Ensuring the presence or absence of latrine facilities"
7,"data","saniabidjan.rda","facilities_loc","factor","Specifies the exact location of the latrine in the household."
8,"data","saniabidjan.rda","facilities_type","factor","Describes the type of latrine used in the household."
9,"data","saniabidjan.rda","lat_sharing","logical","Explains how latrines are used in the household"
10,"data","saniabidjan.rda","nb_user","numeric","Reveals the number of users of the latrines."
11,"data","saniabidjan.rda","impacts_of_sharing","factor","Indication of how the respondent perceives the use of latrines."
12,"data","saniabidjan.rda","lat_care","factor","Gives an overview of the people in charge of latrine cleaning."
13,"data","saniabidjan.rda","clean_freq_wk","numeric","Specifies the cleaning frequency of latrines in the household."
14,"data","saniabidjan.rda","tank_presence","logical","Ensuring the presence or absence of septic tank in the household"
15,"data","saniabidjan.rda","tank_location","factor","Specifies the exact location of the septic tank in the household."
16,"data","saniabidjan.rda","latrines_nb","numeric","Reveals the number of latrines connecting to the septic tank."
17,"data","saniabidjan.rda","tk_status","logical","Expresses septic tank performance status. "
18,"data","saniabidjan.rda","empty_freq_yr","factor","Indicates the emptying frequency of septic tank in the household."
19,"data","saniabidjan.rda","empty_mode","factor","Indicates how the septic tank is emptied in the household."
20,"data","saniabidjan.rda","empty_price","numeric","Shows the charge for emptying the septic tank."
21,"data","saniabidjan.rda","wastwat_dispos","factor","Show whether the household has wastewater disposal facilities."
22,"data","saniabidjan.rda","waste_cont","logical","Identify whether the household has solid waste disposal facilities."
23,"data","saniabidjan.rda","waste_cont_loc","factor","Precise location of solid waste disposal equipment."
24,"data","saniabidjan.rda","cont_empty_wk","numeric","Indicates the emptying frequency of solid waste disposal equipment"
25,"data","saniabidjan.rda","common_ill","factor","Overview of the most common disease in the household associated with sanitation."
